title: Sancroft International
text:
Sancroft International is a London-based international <a href="sustainability">sustainability</a> consultancy company founded in 1997 and chaired by former UK <a href="Conservative%20Party%20%28UK%29">conservative</a> MP <a href="John%20Gummer">John Gummer</a>, now a member of the <a href="House%20of%20Lords">House of Lords</a> (Lord Deben). Several other members of the Gummer family are involved in running the business.
Recently-published reports have investigated topics including <a href="Plastic">sustainable plastics</a>, <a href="energy%20infrastructure">energy infrastructure</a>, and <a href="modern%20slavery">modern slavery</a> in <a href="public%20procurement">public procurement</a>.
